markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spiteful Rake](/Feats.aspx?ID=2339) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
claw unarmed attack

**Requirements**
You have both hands free.

</column>

---

Your instincts sing of spite and malice, and you've learned a devastating trick: go for the eyes. You make a claw Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for 1 round. On a critical hit, the target is instead [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1 round and dazzled until restored to maximum hit points.
name: Spiteful Rake
